refsection.para: A label for this element.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A list of userfunctions to render the field value.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Holds the renderer configuration.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A list of chained renderer classes that work on list data structures. The default renderer class uses the column configuration, to render the list of field data in a list of rows and columns. By default this renderer iscalled at position 100. All defined renderer before 100 work on a field data list, while renderer after 100 work on a column list data structure.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Configuration of a single renderer.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The class name of the renderers php class.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Defines aggregates of data fields.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Named definition of a single data field.

refentry.refsection:
Children of [yourAggregateFieldId]: methodmethod Description
Defined aggregate methods. Datatype String Posible Values min,max,sum,avg Default
StdWrap 0 Prototype
Example
scopescope Description
The scope for the aggregation can be either set to the current page or to the whole query. Aggregates for the current page are calculated internally without an additonal database query. Datatype String Posible Values page,query Default
StdWrap 0 Prototype
Example
special fieldIdentifier
